pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, February 1, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Mayor of Villeray–Saint-Michel–Parc-Extension Giuliana Fumagalli, Councillor for Park-Extension Mary Deros, Councillor for Villeray Rosannie Filato, and Councillor for François-Perreault Sylvain Ouellet to address issues relating to the riding of Papineau.

Constituency Office of the Right Honourable Justin Trudeau
1100, boulevard Crémazie Est, Suite 220

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with residents of the Maison des sourds.

Maison des sourds
2200, boulevard Crémazie Est

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive to the entrance at 8143, rue Bordeaux no later than 3:00 p.m.
